name: Something's Gonna Happen
description:
Take control of the most humble and altruistic scientist wanting to save the world from a corrupted government's plan of turning everyone into zombies: will you be able to find the antidote to the plague?

This Project was created for the Holistic3d Game Jam with a Theme of "Conspiracy Theory" by:

Svalinn85: Code

TurteFlyte: Graphics

F.Silver: Music

All SFXs are royalty free.
